actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a program for flood prevention in the Lower Rio Grande Basin, Tex., to enhance and stablize the agricultural economy of the area.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a program for flood prevention in the Tower Rio Grande Basin, Texas. Authorizes appropriations of $21,000,000 for this program.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a program for flood prevention in the Lower Rio Grande Basin, Tex., to enhance and stablize the agricultural economy of the area.
